description: Main entry point for the Ping Pong Flutter frontend app. Sets orientations, initializes the app widget, and configures themes and routes.

classes.name: PingPongApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, applying theme and routing to main game page.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter bindings, locks screen orientation to portrait, and runs the Ping Pong app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the MaterialApp widget configured with theme and home page.
